data_structures: no explicit data structures beyond input array
algorithm_technique: Combinatorics: Factorial calculation based on a strict complexity ordering
problem_summary_simple: Find valid unlock orders for computers based on complexity and dependencies.
problem_summary_technical: Checks if the first element is the minimum complexity and all subsequent elements have increasing complexity; if so, calculates (n-1)!.
key_insights: The problem simplifies to checking if the complexity array is strictly increasing after the first element.
If the condition is met, any permutation of the remaining n-1 elements is valid.
The modulo operation is crucial for large results.
